Class VectorUtilities

extends java.lang.Object

      • readFile

        public static VectorToken readFile(java.io.File inputFile,
                                   java.lang.String typeNameStr)
                            throws IllegalActionException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Create a vector token from a specific type in a file containing features.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - the file to read
        typeNameStr - the feature type in the file to read. this can be null, but must be specified if more than one feature type is present in the file.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException
        java.io.IOException

      • readFile

        public static VectorToken readFile(java.io.File inputFile,
                                   java.lang.String typeNameStr,
                                   org.opengis.referencing.crs.CoordinateReferenceSystem defaultCRS)
                            throws IllegalActionException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Create a vector token from a specific type in a file containing features.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - the file to read
        typeNameStr - the feature type in the file to read. this can be null, but must be specified if more than one feature type is present in the file.
        crs - The coordinate reference system used if not specified in the file.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException
        java.io.IOException

      • readGeoJSONString

        public static VectorToken readGeoJSONString(java.lang.String geoJSON,
                                            org.opengis.referencing.crs.CoordinateReferenceSystem defaultCRS)
                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            JSONException,
                                            IllegalActionException
        Read a string containing GeoJSON using a default CRS. The default CRS is only used if the GeoJSON string does not contain the CRS.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        JSONException
        IllegalActionException

      • readGeoJSONString

        public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection readGeoJSONString(java.lang.String geoJSON,
                                                                                 org.opengis.referencing.crs.CoordinateReferenceSystem defaultCRS,
                                                                                 org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeatureType defaultType)
                                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                 JSONException,
                                                                                 IllegalActionException
        Read a string containing GeoJSON.
        Parameters:
        geoJSON - the geojson string.
        defaultCRS - CRS used if one not found in geojson string.
        defaultType - feture type used if one not found in geojson string.
        Returns:
        Features in geojson string.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        JSONException
        IllegalActionException

                                  java.lang.String typeNameStr)

                                  IllegalActionException
        Get a vector token from a WFS service.
        Parameters:
        urlStr - the WFS url
        typeNameStr - the feature type to read. can be null, but must be specified if more than one type exists on in the WFS service.

                                                                  throws IllegalActionException
        Reproject a set of features.
        Parameters:
        features - The set of features.
        destCRS - The new coordinate reference system.
        Returns:

      • reproject

        public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection reproject(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection features,
                                                                         org.opengis.referencing.crs.CoordinateReferenceSystem crs,
                                                                         org.opengis.referencing.crs.CoordinateReferenceSystem destCRS)
                                                                  throws IllegalActionException
        Reproject a set of features from the specified coordinate reference system.
        Parameters:
        features - The set of features.
        crs - The source coordinate reference system.
        destCRS - The new coordinate reference system.
        Returns:
        The reprojected set of features.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException
